data.lyric:
[ti:More Than My Hometown]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:More Than My Hometown]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]More Than My Hometown - Morgan Wallen
[00:07.89]Lyrics by：Michael Hardy/Ernest Keith Smith/Ryan Vojtesak/Morgan Wallen
[00:15.79]Girl our mamas' are best friends and so are we
[00:19.28]The whole town is rooting for us like the home team
[00:23.65]Most likely to settle down
[00:25.93]Plant a few roots real deep and let 'em grow
[00:30.84]We can't stop this real world from spinning
[00:34.65]Does your bright lights caught
[00:36.08]I don't blame you for picking up
[00:38.27]Your big dream bags are all packed up and ready to go
[00:42.79]But I just need you to know that
[00:45.19]I love you more than a California sunset
[00:49.12]More than a beer when you ain't 21 yet
[00:52.87]More than a Sunday morning Lord
[00:54.89]Turning some poor lost souls around and Hallelujah bound
[01:00.48]I love you more than the feeling when the bass hits the hook
[01:04.57]When a guy gets the girl at the end of the book
[01:08.43]But baby this might be the last time I get to lay you down
[01:13.58]'Cause I can't love you more than my hometown
[01:24.20]I ain't the runaway kind I can't change that
[01:28.11]My heart is stuck in these streets like the train tracks
[01:32.27]City sky ain't the same black
[01:34.71]Ain't that a mad damn shame man to think that
[01:38.70]I love you more than a California sunset
[01:42.39]More than a beer when you ain't 21 yet
[01:46.09]More than a Sunday morning Lord
[01:48.30]Turning some poor lost souls around and Hallelujah bound
[01:53.76]I love you more than the feeling when the bass hits the hook
[01:57.85]When a guy gets the girl at the end of the book
[02:01.70]But baby this might be the last time I get to lay you down
[02:07.05]'Cause I can't love you more than my hometown
[02:12.67]You got a wild in your eyes that I just wasn't born with
[02:17.34]I'm same gas station cup of coffee in the morning
[02:21.06]I need a house on the hill girl not in them
[02:24.23]So hang onto these words 'til them avenues help you forget them
[02:27.93]'Cause I love you more than a California sunset
[02:31.95]I love you more in a 20 dollar sundress
[02:35.91]Hate that loaded down car you got your keys in
[02:39.33]Girl but I hate even more that you're leaving
[02:43.30]I love you more than the feeling when the bass hits the hook
[02:47.35]When a guy gets the girl at the end of the book
[02:51.18]But that ain't you and me so I guess I'll see you around
[02:56.66]'Cause I can't love you more than my hometown
[03:01.22]Love you more than my hometown
[03:05.04]Love you more than my hometown
[03:08.80]Love you more baby love you more
data.trans:
[ti:More Than My Hometown]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:More Than My Hometown]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.89]//
[00:15.79]女孩 我们的母亲亲密无间 我们也是如此
[00:19.28]整座城镇就像是我们的主场 随时都在为我们加油助威
[00:23.65]这可能是我们最理想的安居之所
[00:25.93]它在我们心里播下了种 生根发芽茁壮成长
[00:30.84]世界变化莫测我们无力阻止
[00:34.65]只是你的璀璨光芒是否能得以绽放
[00:36.08]我不会责备你打包好了行囊
[00:38.27]你已经准备就绪要去追逐远大的梦想
[00:42.79]但我只是希望你知道
[00:45.19]我爱你胜过爱加州的斜阳
[00:49.12]胜过未满21岁时对啤酒的渴望
[00:52.87]胜过礼拜日对上帝的虔敬之心
[00:54.89]他救赎了那些迷惘的可怜灵魂 哈利路亚
[01:00.48]我爱你胜过歌曲里的低沉重音带给我的震撼
[01:04.57]男孩在故事的结尾终于同女孩携手一生
[01:08.43]但是宝贝 这可能是我最后一次与你共沉沦
[01:13.58]因为比起你 我更爱我的故乡 
[01:24.20]我不会抛弃它离去 我不会改变自己的本心
[01:28.11]我的心就像铁轨嵌入土地 深深扎根在了这里的大街小巷
[01:32.27]城市的天空不是千篇一律的昏暗
[01:34.71]并不像某个讨厌的疯子说的那样
[01:38.70]我爱你胜过爱加州的斜阳
[01:42.39]胜过未满21岁时对啤酒的渴望
[01:46.09]胜过礼拜日对上帝的虔敬之心
[01:48.30]他救赎了那些迷惘的可怜灵魂 哈利路亚
[01:53.76]我爱你胜过歌曲里的低沉重音带给我的震撼
[01:57.85]男孩在故事的结尾终于同女孩携手一生
[02:01.70]但是宝贝 这可能是我最后一次与你共沉沦
[02:07.05]因为比起你 我更爱我的故乡
[02:12.67]你的眼里有与生俱来的疯狂 那是我得不到的天赋
[02:17.34]清晨我会在同一家加油站喝上一杯咖啡
[02:21.06]女孩 我想要的是山间小屋而不是大同小异的公寓
[02:24.23]所以想说的话还是藏在心里 启程迈向梦想你就会将这些都遗忘
[02:27.93]因为我爱你胜过爱加州的斜阳
[02:31.95]我更喜欢你穿20美元廉价背心裙的模样
[02:35.91]不想看你扭动钥匙启动载满行李的汽车
[02:39.33]女孩 但我更恨你要抛下我远走高飞
[02:43.30]我爱你胜过歌曲里的低沉重音带给我的震撼
[02:47.35]男孩在故事的结尾终于同女孩携手一生
[02:51.18]但那不是你和我 所以我想我只会在远处默默守护你
[02:56.66]因为我不能爱你更胜过爱自己的故乡
[03:01.22]爱你更胜过爱自己的故乡
[03:05.04]爱你更胜过爱自己的故乡
[03:08.80]更爱你 宝贝 更爱你
